meanings: be a man of great[high] caliber
be a man of great capacity

meanings.meaning: be in with a shout (of something/of doing something)
be greater/more than the sum of its parts

examples.korean: Salt water is more buoyant than fresh water. 발음듣기 바닷물이 민물보다 부력이 더 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Salt water is more buoyant than fresh water. 발음

examples.korean: Sam has a wide mouth. 발음듣기 샘은 입이 (옆으로) 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam has a wide mouth. 발음

examples.korean: I’m taller than him. 발음듣기 나는 그보다 키가 더 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
It’s odds-on that he’ll be late. 발음듣기 그가 늦을 공산이 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s odds-on that he’ll be late. 발음

examples.korean: There are rich pickings to be had by investing in this sort of company. 발음듣기 이런 종류의 회사에 투자를 하면 얻을 수 있는 수익이 아주 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There are rich pickings to be had by investing in this sort of company. 발음
